statements: SELECT * FROM artifacts;
SELECT artifact_name, culture, catalog_number FROM artifacts WHERE culture = 'Greek';
SELECT artifact_name, catalog_number FROM artifacts WHERE culture = 'Roman' ORDER BY artifact_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM artifacts WHERE artifact_id = 10;
SELECT artifact_name, documentation FROM artifacts WHERE artifact_name LIKE '%Sculpture%';
SELECT * FROM artifacts WHERE culture = 'Greek' ORDER BY artifact_name DESC;
SELECT artifact_name, catalog_number FROM artifacts WHERE documentation IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_artifacts, culture FROM artifacts GROUP BY culture;
SELECT * FROM artifacts WHERE catalog_number LIKE 'MS-%';
SELECT artifact_name, documentation FROM artifacts WHERE culture = 'Egyptian' AND catalog_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY artifact_name ASC;
SELECT artifact_name, origin FROM artifacts;
SELECT * FROM artifacts WHERE culture = 'Greek';
SELECT artifact_name, material FROM artifacts WHERE origin = 'China';
SELECT artifact_name, culture, material FROM artifacts ORDER BY culture ASC;
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE document_type = 'certificate';
SELECT artifact_name, culture, origin FROM artifacts WHERE culture='Greek';
SELECT * FROM artifacts WHERE material='Bronze' ORDER BY artifact_name DESC;
SELECT artifact_id, artifact_name, culture FROM artifacts WHERE origin='Egypt' AND material='Stone';
SELECT artifacts.artifact_name, documents.document_type FROM artifacts JOIN documents ON artifacts.artifact_id = documents.artifact_id WHERE documents.document_type='Origins';
SELECT * FROM artifacts WHERE material='Gold' AND culture='Roman' ORDER BY artifact_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM artifacts_from_different_cultures;
SELECT artifact_name, culture, description FROM artifacts_from_different_cultures;
SELECT artifact_name, description FROM artifacts_from_different_cultures WHERE culture = 'Egyptian';
SELECT * FROM artifact_materials WHERE material_name = 'Bronze';
SELECT location_name, country, region FROM artifact_locations WHERE country = 'Greece';
SELECT artifact_name, culture, acquisition_date FROM artifacts_from_different_cultures;
SELECT * FROM artifact_materials WHERE material_name = 'Gold';
SELECT artifact_name, culture, location_name, country FROM artifacts_from_different_cultures JOIN artifact_locations ON artifacts_from_different_cultures.artifact_id = artifact_locations.location_id;
SELECT artifact_name, material_name FROM artifacts_from_different_cultures JOIN artifact_materials ON artifacts_from_different_cultures.artifact_id = artifact_materials.material_id;
SELECT * FROM artifacts_from_different_cultures WHERE culture = 'Egyptian' ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM artifacts;
SELECT artifact_name, age FROM artifacts WHERE culture='Greek';
SELECT artifact_name, location FROM artifacts JOIN artifact_locations ON artifacts.artifact_id = artifact_locations.artifact_id;
SELECT * FROM artifacts WHERE age > 100 ORDER BY artifact_name DESC;
SELECT artifact_name, document_type, document_url FROM artifacts JOIN artifact_documents ON artifacts.artifact_id = artifact_documents.artifact_id WHERE culture='Roman';
SELECT * FROM artifacts WHERE artifact_name = 'Sphinx' AND age > 2000 ORDER BY culture DESC
SELECT artifact_name, culture, age FROM artifacts WHERE culture = 'Greek' AND age BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT artifact_name, material_type, quantity FROM artifacts JOIN artifact_materials ON artifacts.artifact_id = artifact_materials.artifact_id WHERE material_type = 'Bronze' ORDER BY quantity DESC

SELECT artifacts.artifact_name, artifact_locations.location FROM artifacts JOIN artifact_locations ON artifacts.artifact_id = artifact_locations.artifact_id WHERE artifact_locations.location = 'Egypt'
SELECT DISTINCT culture FROM artifacts
SELECT * FROM artifacts_from_cultures ORDER BY year_created DESC
SELECT artifact_name, culture_name FROM artifacts_from_cultures WHERE culture_name = 'Greek'
SELECT artifact_name, description FROM artifacts_from_cultures WHERE year_created > 1000
SELECT artifact_name, artifact_type FROM artifacts_from_cultures JOIN artifact_types ON artifacts_from_cultures.artifact_id = artifact_types.type_id
SELECT * FROM artifacts_from_cultures LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM artifacts_from_cultures;
SELECT artifact_name, culture_name FROM artifacts_from_cultures ORDER BY culture_name DESC;
SELECT artifact_name, year_created FROM artifacts_from_cultures WHERE year_created > 1000;
SELECT a.artifact_name, b.material_name FROM artifacts_from_cultures a JOIN artifact_materials b ON a.artifact_id = b.material_id;
SELECT location_name, COUNT(*) AS total_artifacts FROM artifact_locations GROUP BY location_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
